page.title: 10Roxton Church 750 Years Old
page.content: This year is the 750th Anniversary of the dedication of Roxton Church to its Patron Saint,St.Mary Magdalene in 1235.There is a wide range of events organised including a Heritage Weekend with an exhibition of records and photographs of the church and parish. The present vicar,Revd.Norman Jeffery, serves the parishes of Roxton and Great Barford.He became vicar in 1978 and is often to be seen speeding around the area on his high powered motorbike.He is a very popular and hard working member of the commmunity. He is a former engineer with British Rail. The money raised by the special events in the village is to be invested in a restoration fund.
